statements: SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT cardholder_name, current_balance FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_id, cardholder_name FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE current_balance <= credit_limit * 0.25;
SELECT card_id, cardholder_name, credit_limit, current_balance FROM credit_cards ORDER BY current_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE cardholder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, current_balance FROM credit_cards WHERE current_balance < 1000 ORDER BY cardholder_name ASC;
SELECT card_id, cardholder_name, current_balance, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > current_balance;
SELECT cardholder_name, current_balance, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE current_balance < 500 OR (credit_limit > 7500 AND card_id % 2 = 0) ORDER BY card_id ASC, credit_limit DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, current_balance FROM Credit_Cardholders ORDER BY cardholder_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Credit_Card_Transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM Credit_Cardholders WHERE credit_limit < 5000;

SELECT cardholder_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM Credit_Cardholders JOIN Credit_Card_Transactions ON Credit_Cardholders.cardholder_id = Credit_Card_Transactions.cardholder_id GROUP BY cardholder_name;

SELECT cardholder_name, transaction_date, amount FROM Credit_Cardholders JOIN Credit_Card_Transactions ON Credit_Cardholders.cardholder_id = Credit_Card_Transactions.cardholder_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Credit_Cardholders ORDER BY cardholder_id DESC, cardholder_name;
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit, current_balance FROM Credit_Cardholders WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM Credit_Card_Transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT c.cardholder_name, ct.transaction_date, ct.amount FROM Credit_Cardholders c JOIN Credit_Card_Transactions ct ON c.cardholder_id = ct.cardholder_id WHERE c.credit_limit > c.current_balance;

SELECT c.cardholder_name, SUM(ct.amount) AS total_spent FROM Credit_Cardholders c JOIN Credit_Card_Transactions ct ON c.cardholder_id = ct.cardholder_id GROUP BY c.cardholder_name HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT * FROM cardholders;
SELECT cardholder_name, cardholder_id FROM cardholders ORDER BY cardholder_id DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, COUNT(*) FROM cardholders GROUP BY cardholder_name;
SELECT card_id, credit_limit, balance FROM credit_cards WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cardholders WHERE cardholder_id = 1;
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM cardholders JOIN credit_cards ON cardholders.cardholder_id = credit_cards.cardholder_id;

SELECT cardholder_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM cardholders JOIN credit_cards ON cardholders.cardholder_id = credit_cards.cardholder_id JOIN transactions ON credit_cards.card_id = transactions.card_id GROUP BY cardholder_name;

SELECT transaction_id, cardholder_name, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN credit_cards ON transactions.card_id = credit_cards.card_id JOIN cardholders ON credit_cards.cardholder_id = cardholders.cardholder_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > balance ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardHolder
SELECT cardholder_name, current_balance FROM CreditCardHolder
SELECT transaction_id, cardholder_id, transaction_date FROM TransactionHistory
SELECT credit_limit, current_balance FROM CreditCardHolder WHERE cardholder_id = 1
SELECT cardholder_id, credit_score FROM CreditScore ORDER BY credit_score DESC
SELECT * FROM CreditCardHolder
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM CreditCardHolder WHERE credit_limit > 5000
SELECT c.cardholder_name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date FROM CreditCardHolder c JOIN TransactionHistory t ON c.cardholder_id = t.cardholder_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC
SELECT c.cardholder_name, o.overdue_amount, o.due_date FROM CreditCardHolder c JOIN OverduePayments o ON c.cardholder_id = o.cardholder_id WHERE o.overdue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY o.due_date ASC
SELECT c.cardholder_name, cs.credit_score FROM CreditCardHolder c JOIN CreditScore cs ON c.cardholder_id = cs.cardholder_id WHERE cs.credit_score < 600
SELECT * FROM CreditCards;
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM CreditCards WHERE current_balance > 0;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT cardholder_name, email FROM CardHolders WHERE cardholder_id = 1;
SELECT card_number, status FROM CardStatus WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT cardholder_name, credit_limit FROM CreditCards WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY cardholder_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT ch.cardholder_name, c.credit_limit, p.amount FROM CardHolders ch INNER JOIN CreditCards c ON ch.cardholder_name = c.cardholder_name INNER JOIN Payments p ON c.card_number = p.card_number WHERE p.amount > 500 ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC;
SELECT cc.card_number, cs.status FROM CreditCards cc LEFT JOIN CardStatus cs ON cc.card_number = cs.card_number WHERE cs.status IS NULL;
SELECT ch.cardholder_name, t.amount FROM CardHolders ch JOIN Transactions t ON ch.cardholder_name = (SELECT cardholder_name FROM CreditCards WHERE card_number = t.card_number);
